name: Unknown entity
description: The entry needs an entity assigning before it will appear in the data.

name: Combined values
description: The field value has been constucted by combinining data from multiple different entries.

name: Invalid coordinates
description: It was not possible to process the field as geospatial coordinates.

name: Invalid date
description: It was not possible to process the field as a date value.

name: Invalid decimal
description: It was not possible process the field as a decimal number.

name: Invalid integer
description: It was not possible to process field as a an integer value.

name: Value too small
description: The number was less than the minimum value allowed for the field.

name: Value too large
description: The decimal value was greater than the maximum value allowed for the field.

name: Invalid flag
description: It was not possible to process the field as a yes or no value.

name: Invalid URI
description: It was not possible to process the field as a URI.

name: Invalid WKT
description: It was not possible to process the field as a WKT value.

name: Future entry date
description: The entry-date cannot be in the future.

name: Default field
description: The value has been taken from another field.

name: Default value
description: The value has been derrived from other data.

name: Patched value
description: The value has changed as a result of processing.

name: WGS84 flipped
description: The latitude and logitude fields values have been exchanged.

name: WGS84 out of bounds
description: The geospatial coordinates are out of bounds.

name: Mercator conversion
description: The geospatial data has been processed as Mercator coordinates.

name: Mercator flipped
description: The geospatial data has been processed as flipped Mercator coordinates.

name: OSGB conversion
description: The geospatial data has been processed as OSGB coordinates.

name: OSGB flipped
description: The latitude and logitude fields have been processed as flipped OSGB coordinates.

name: Removed URI prefix
description: The URI value has been converted into a CURIE value.

name: Invalid geometry
description: An error was encountered processing the geometry.
